dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 4394 IH: Serve Our Heroes Now Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Grayson introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To prohibit the awarding of contracts to contractors responsible for delayed openings of Veterans Affairs facilities.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Serve Our Heroes Now Act
.

section.header: Prohibition on awarding contracts to those responsible for delayed openings of Veterans Affairs facilities
section.text: No contract may be awarded to any contractor if the past performance of the contractor resulted in the completion of a construction project at a facility of the Department of Veterans Affairs more than 24 months after the original agreed-upon completion date for the project.
